Σταυροφορία στο Διάστημα
boardgame.description: SPACE CRUSADE is a cooperative effort between Milton Bradley UK and Games Workshop. It takes the role-playing elements from Milton Bradley's HEROQUEST and merges them with Game Workshop's dark vision of the future._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;From the manual...._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;One player must control the aliens. This player is called the ALIEN PLAYER. The other players control the three Commanders and their Space Marines. The players are called the MARINE PLAYERS._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each game is a mission. The missions are detailed in the Mission Manual. The game starts with the Alien Player reading out one of the missions. A map in the Mission Manual then shows the Alien player how to setup the game boards and Docking boards. The Mission Manual also tell the Alien player how many, and which, Blip tokens he should take, as well as which Reinforcement tokens he may use._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Expansions_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Space Crusade: Mission Dreadnought _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Space Crusade: Eldar Attack_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: The complete _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;basic_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; Space Crusade game, used and in very good condition. The box is *big*, so shipping is a bit higher than for most games. Note: Originally had listed this as a package deal w/ the expansions, but decided to sell it seperately.
Heavily used game. Complete. Box is rough, but intact.
Played with a lot but still in good condition. Models unpainted. Will consider offers.

The complete _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;basic_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; Space Crusade game, used and in very good condition. English version. The box is *big*, so shipping is a bit higher than for most games. Note: Originally had listed this as a package deal w/ the expansions, but decided to sell it seperately (expansions have since sold).

punched, but looks unplayed, really unplayed ! Excellent condition It is in french but I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m providing english rules on photocopies (from the original english rule book). Also, a translation for the cards + color scans of the original english cards, no french required at all. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m adding to set of extra missions etc. from the white dwarf magazines, 2 nice bonus. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m also selling both expansions for SC, have a look ! Thanks

This is an INCOMPLETE copy of this game, for PARTS ONLY. Here is what is included: 24 armored doors, 21 stands 8 Ultramarine equipment cards (blue) 4 ultramarine order cards (blue) 8 Blood angels equipment cards (red) 4 blood angels order cards (red) 3 imperial fists equipment cards (yellow) 1 imperial fists order card (yellow) 28 alien event cards 1 blood angels space marine reference card (red) 1 imperial fist marines reference card (yellow) 6 dice (2 red, 4 white) 14 dark green goblin-looking figures (one piece) with bases 8 dark green ogre-looking figures (with a axe or sword plus a gun) with bases 4 light gray alien figures with a tall gun/bayonet with bases 3 4-armed black aliens with bases 5 black cyborg-type figures (with attachable backpack _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; guns) with bases 5 yellow marines with backpacks _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; various gun attachments with bases 5 red marines with backpacks and various gun attachments with bases 5 blue marines with backpacks and various gun attachments with bases (note - these blue marines have been about 3/4 painted with modeling paint - they look pretty good, actually) 4 large floor sections 4 long wall sections with door cutouts various black clips for holding the wall _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; floor sections together 1 folded cardboard reference chart with plastic end pieces 1 large gray mech unit with 3 guns _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; base a bunch of cardboard counters - green square ones, circular ones, and some to go into the command units 2 order recorders (yellow _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; blue) with plastic slides and spaces for 3 cardboard tokens (the plastic corner of one of these is cracked) 2 square cardboard hatch-looking things 2 square cardboard pieces showing a ramp, presumably the entry point for the marines??? 1 box with 3 split corners on the top (2 have been taped with masking tape); box bottom _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; plastic insert are in good shape The components that are present are generally in very good condition. A few of the extra weapons for the marines have broken pins so they can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t be attached. There are at least enough weapons for every marine in all 3 colors. The long cardboard wall pieces have seen a lot of use and are creased in some places, but will still stand up fine.

German edition. When I was counting all the stuff I was missing 4 counters - but afterwards I had 4 counters left and I had no idea what these counters are for. So maybe it is complete. But maybe not. I was not able to find out if the miniatures are complete. By number - yes - but they have removable weapons and there have been extra ones and I have no idea how many have to be in the game. Also no clue about the wallholders. There are some but I could not find out about them. The box has two broken corners. So there is no guarantee for this game - I did my best to count but had some problems - see above. Shipping is 9.80 - wrapped only n paper, insurance 1.30$ optional.
This is the DUTCH version of the game, called Starquest. Game is in excellent condition, except one of the two rulebooks which has some water damage.
box is pretty banged up and has edges taped. Contents complete except for one peg for the red marine reference card, not critical for game play. can email any photos wanted!
Game components in very good condition, unpainted. Box heavily scuffed, split at one corner and indented from being in a pile. P _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; P to UK destination = £9
This is for daniel silverthorne (mexilplif) only for his kind bid in the Cici Auction Payment to be arranged
Components complet and in good condition. Game box lid is split and taped at one corner. Shipping to UK destination £10 Shipping surface mail USA £18 Shipping airmail USA £29

Game components complete and in excellent condition, most are still on spruces. Game box is split and taped with some tape removal damage. Shipping to UK destination £22 Surface shipping to USA £18 Air shipping to USA £29

Contents complete, box in very good condition wear only on corners. No modals glued or painted.Both rulebooks in very good condition no fading tares or creases.Original dice and all cards present in very good condition.Shipping outside UK is at buyers expense.

German version. Complete. Some of the minis are painted, some are broken but fixable. Shipping Germany 7 Euro Shipping European Union 17 Euro Shipping World 35 or 40 Euro PayPal plus 3 Euro Money transfer via IBAN/BIC preferred
Most figures painted Shipping to Uk desination £10 Shipping USa surafce mail £18 Shipping USA airmail £29

This copy of space crusade the box has no ripping and is only slightly damaged on the corners. All of the pieces are intact and in very good condition. I also have got most of the mission dreadnought expansion but I am missing the dreadnoughts. I can only ship to uk
Made a full component check. Everything in great condition. 7.50 pounds postage to the UK, or can collection in person (London area) cheers, James
Super condition- I think just missing one counter
Components complete and in good condition. Box split at one corner and scuffed Shipping to UK destination £8 Shipping to USa airmail £26 Shipping to USA surface mail £15
One weapon has pin broken off, otherwise complete and good condition. Dreadnought and 5 weapons have been painted. SDhipping to UK £8 Shipping to USA, £26 airmail, £15 surface mail

- in shrinkwrap - very good shape - English version

MINT CONDITION; NEVER BEEN OPENED... IN ORIGINAL SHRINKWRAP This copy has been in my collection for over 20 years and has been lovingly cared for; never opened; pefect condition; mint in the box with original shrink-wrapping. It is the English language edition.

Space Crusade plus the Eldar Attack and Mission Dreadnaught expansions. Some slight shelf wear to main box. Missing two of the 21 marines, plus the expansions are in the main box, so I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t have the packaging for them.

Parts Copy of Space Crusade plus Mission Dreadnaught Expansion. Box lid is worn and dented. Complete: Set of boards, wall sections, doors, commander scanners, dice, mission and experience tokens, cards, reinforcement tokens and the manuals. Incomplete: Missing 1 blip token (of 40), 1 marine reference chart (of 4), 1 dreadnaught (of 3 - remaining two are glued together), one android has a broken weapon (can be glued), bases for chaos marines missing, 7 orks (of 8 - remaining one has broken weapons - can be glued together - and no base), 6 gretchin (of 14 - none of the remaining 8 have bases), all three genestealers, two marine commanders (of 3), 10 space marines (of 18 - various marine and commander weapons also missing or broken) and also missing alien control panel.
For Manchu8990
English version, 100% complete. VG condition (some items looks like new). Box looks also very well. Delivery in Europe 19 EURO, outside Europe 27 Euro.

Space Crusade - English First Edition (1990) Publisher: Milton Bradley Condition: Very good. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve checked the contents against those listed in the manual and they appear to be 100% complete. All the miniatures are present and in very good condition; off sprue but unpainted and unglued. Boards, cards, blips, doors, walls etc all present and accounted for. The box is in very good condition as well, minor shelf wear but no split corners or other visible damage. For more pics you can view them here http://cm-ebay.webs.com/apps/photos/album?albumid=15418088 S_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;H is £5.99 to anywhere in the UK except Highlands and Islands (possible extra charge for those locations). For S_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;H to Europe, USA, Australia and elsewhere please contact me for a quote. For those on a budget great deals available on surface shipping rates! I have good experience shipping internationally.
Game components complete (unpainted, not glued) and in very good condition Box scuffed and distorted. Shipping to UK destination £7

Boards, cards, blips, doors, walls etc. all present and accounted for. The box is in acceptable condition. There are a number of split corners or edges but all have been repaired and are solid. Dutch versions Base game including the expansion Mission Dreadnought (missie durfal) Expansion is without the box. The miniature for the red captain is missing and has been replaced by a standard Games Workshop space marine.
All bagged _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; well cared for. An excellent copy.

German Edition, missing 1 reinforcement counter (Chaos Commander) but otherwise complete. (Slight update, all doors are now in very good condition, found some spares) - Cards are in very good condition. - The dreadnought mini has been spray-painted metallic, 1 gun appears glued to the chassis. The other 2 guns are included, also spray painted metallic. All other miniatures are unpainted, all the weapons from the space marines are included, and all are in very good condition. - The map is complete, with the vertical stands and all 5 connectors. Some bends as always near where the doors are, but nothing is torn off or apart and it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s all complete. - All doors are there including stand and the stands are all whole. All in very good condition. - All the blip and reinforcement counters are there (except the 1 missing reinforcement chaos commander counter) and in very good condition. - All the other components are there and in very good condition (books, mission counters, experience trackers etc)

Includes base game, Mission Dreadnought and German edition of Eldar Attack in the main game box. Main game box has been taped with brown packing tape on two corners. German Eldar Attack cards/components have been pasted with English translations. Includes a dedicated White Dwarf magazine, and some extra photocopies of game articles. Other than that, the components are in very good condition. A very clean, playing copy. If this ships interstate, it will be in a padded bag with bubble wrap. The box is too large for boxed shipping.
Includes Mission Dreadnought expansion (unboxed)

Components in excellent condition. Played maybed once. All components have been inventoried, every figure, panel and card is present. Missing 4 blips and 3 rank badges. Please provide zip code to get total with shipping. 4.5 lbs

I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m moving and need to down size a bit, so it is time for some of my games to go. This game is brand new, still in shrink-wrap. Paypal or Direct Deposit is fine. Pick up is welcome in Brisbane. Feel free to ask any questions and check out the other games I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling.
Includes additional boards

Checked abd all componants bagged. This has never been played - the deck of cards are still in cellophane - hence the Like New tag. However I did punch and construct the minis in a fit of youthful enthusiasm! The minis are glued to their bases, but all the weapons are separate. The box is extremely good, with the most minor of shelfwear marks amounting to small corner rubs.
This is for BGG auction winner Seahawk only.

Played several times. Apparent wear and tear on box, otherwise intact. Components in good condition. Missing two door bases and one Imperial Fist commander heavy bolter. One or two of the space marines have glued weapons or jet packs. Included eight androids (six of them with painted eyes - geez), since the original ones were broken. Also, included two packs of bases, just in case. Dreadnought is somewhat painted, but complete with all three weapons. Payment through Paypal or IBAN, pm me for more information! Images: http://boardgamegeek.com/image/2841862/eniaios http://boardgamegeek.com/image/2841863/eniaios http://boardgamegeek.com/image/2841864/eniaios http://boardgamegeek.com/image/2841865/eniaios http://boardgamegeek.com/image/2841866/eniaios http://boardgamegeek.com/image/2841867/eniaios http://boardgamegeek.com/image/2841868/eniaios http://boardgamegeek.com/image/2841869/eniaios
Box damage and one marine with broken weapon sprue stuck in figure.

Very good condition, includes (unboxed) Mission Dreadnaught expansion. 4 bases were missing, so I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve replaced them with a pack of identical slotted bases (they have a different copy right logo on the underside)

This lot includes Games Workshop_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Space Crusade, Space Crusade: Mission Dreadlnaught; and two photocopied White Dwarf articles of new rules and missions from issues 145 and 134. Some of the minis have been primed and some have been reasonably well painted and some are entirely unpainted. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve inventoried and it is missing one blue peg for the commander scanner. One of the commander scanners boards has some cracking (more than just a small crack, but could easily be taped back together). Includes 2 extra squads (of 5 each) of space marines with weapons, 2 extra blip tokens, some extra doors and door clips. Missing the Dreadnaught box (just mixed in the main box). Box top has split corners, bottom box has nice integrity. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve packed all the game materials up securely and it weighs in at 6 lbs 4 oz. I will ship via USPS priority mail from 43202 and will ask for the cost of postage.

This is an listing for sale of the following pieces from Space Crusade 3 blue marines 1 blue bolter 3 blue backpacks 1 red marine 1 red missile launcher 1 red backpack 1 yellow captain 1 yellow backpack 5 figure stands The listed price includes shipping to Belgium.

Space Crusade COMPLETE INCLUDING MISSION DREADNOUGHT EXPANSION The game is used, but well cared for. One Ultramarine has had the clip on Bolter snapped off (can be glued back in place, minimal impact on playability as although weapons are designed to be interchangeable, squads are required to have some marines armed with Bolters) - otherwise, all miniatures are included, none are damaged. One Chaos Marine has been part-painted, paint can be stripped with Dettol - otherwise all miniatures clean and unpainted. All cards and counters included, with standard wear from careful use. Box is scuffed but intact. Box for Mission:Dreadnaught not included, but all components present. UK shipping £7, international shipping please email for quote, but by all means take advantage of the weak pound and get yourself a bargain. Game will be bubble-wrapped and boxed and contents secured to prevent rattling and absolutely minimise risk of damage. Some form of insurance will need to be factored n to the postage costs - current (unconfirmed) guess is that US postage would be in the region of £20-£30 Photos can be provided, and probably will be posted up here shortly.
Language: english Publisher: Milton Bradley Game Condition: Perfect Box Condition: Some Wear Availability: Now Available ID Gis: 24011 (for reference)

In excellent condition, 100% complete. Cards sleeved, unpainted. English edition. Minor wear on box/insert Also includes: Eldar Attack! Expansion, English edition, mint/complete but no box Cards sleeved, unpainted. Mission: Dreadnought Expansion, English Edition, mint complete but no box. Cards sleeved, unpainted. White Wolf #134 in good condition (features addl scenarios) White Wolf #145 in good condition (features addl scenarios) All fits in the base game box, photos available on request. An excellent opportunity to get a hard to find game, complete with even harder to find expansion! Shipping $15 in the US to include insurance, please contact me re: international rates prior to buying Thanks for viewing!
